text:
Bless the Lord, O! my soul,
And all that is within me
Bless His Holy Name
Bless the Lord, O! my soul
And all that is within me
Bless His holy Name.

He has done great things (3)
Bless His holy Name.


King of kings forever and ever,
Lord of lords forever and ever,
King of kings forever and ever,
King of kings and Lord of lords
